item.title: Roborock Saros Z70 Review: OmniGrip Doesn’t Quite Work
item.description: I tested the robot vacuum with the retractable arm, which got a lot of attention at CES. It still has a long way to go.

item.title: Our Favorite Bottle Washers for Keeping Your Baby Bottles Safe and Clean (2025)
item.description: Keeping baby bottles clean and sterilized is a chore. We tested automatic bottle washers to see if they’re worth buying.

item.title: This Guy Attached 21 Chef’s Knives to a Slicing Robot Arm to Determine Which One Is Best
item.description: Certified kitchen knife nerd Scott Heimendinger used a robot arm on multiple chef’s knives to collect 100,000 data points about which blades cut most efficiently. He’s ranked them from best to worst.
